name: Finbox
long_description:
Finbox helps AR & AP teams automate their customer & supplier communication. It monitors your shared inbox and prioritizes, routes, and replies to email based on data from your ERP and procurement systems. 

With Finbox, finance teams stay lean as they scale, gain visibility into their processes, and get stakeholders the data they need in minutes instead of days.
one_liner: AI agent for AP & AR communication
